name: Introduction to Computer Science
description: An introductory course to the basics of computer science, covering fundamental concepts and programming.

name: Data Structures
description: This course covers the organization, processing, and storage of data using various data structures.

name: Algorithms
description: A study of algorithms, focusing on design, analysis, and implementation for solving complex problems.

name: Operating Systems
description: An overview of operating system principles, including process management, memory management, and file systems.

name: Database Systems
description: This course introduces database concepts, design, and management, including SQL and NoSQL databases.

name: Computer Networks
description: An in-depth study of computer networking principles, protocols, and architectures.

name: Software Engineering
description: A comprehensive course on software development methodologies, project management, and software lifecycle.

name: Artificial Intelligence
description: A comprehensive course on software development methodologies, project management, and software lifecycle.

name: Machine Learning
description: A comprehensive course on software development methodologies, project management, and software lifecycle.
